channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Investigators release additional video of possible Brown gunman as search continues
item.description: Authorities are asking the public for any footage they might have of the gunman who fatally shot two students and wounded nine others at Brown University.

item.title: Brown University shooting leaves students, community frustrated with official response
Brown mourns the loss of an aspiring doctor and campus leader to the campus attack
